weapon_description: A spinning mechanical blade produced by the Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop that seems to hide secrets from a bygone era...
weapon_skill_description: After an Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst is used, ATK is increased by 48% for 20s. If the equipping character creates a Shield while this effect is active, they will gain the Electrifying Edict effect for 20s: All nearby party members deal 80% more Lunar-Charged DMG.
